name: Nightmare Pop!
description: You play as a little girl, Clementine, trapped in her own nightmares; blow bubbles to capture your fears. In front of you stand twitchâ€™s viewers that will do everything to stop you, interacting directly with the level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5500 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 Storage: 1 GB available space
